titleStmt.title: Justice triumphing, or, The spoylers spoyled laid forth in a gratulatory sermon for the miraculous discovery of, and our glorious delivery from the barbarous powder-plot / preached at Pauls, November the 5th, 1646 by Nathanael Hardy ...
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.L. for Nathanael Webb and Wilfram Grantham ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
